00021 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00022 {
00023     DbjError error;
00024     DbjErrorCode rc = DBJ_SUCCESS;
00025     DbjRecordManager *recordMgr = DbjRecordManager::getInstance();
00026     TableId tableId = DBJ_UNKNOWN_TABLE_ID;
00027     PageId pageId = 0;
00028 
00029     if (argc != 3) {
00030         cout << "Table ID: " << flush;
00031         cin >> tableId;
00032         cout << "Page ID: " << flush;
00033         cin >> pageId;
00034     }
00035     else {
00036         tableId = atoi(argv[1]);
00037         pageId = atoi(argv[2]);
00038     }
00039     rc = recordMgr->dumpPageContent(tableId, pageId);
00040     if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00041         char errorMsg[1000] = { '\0' };
00042         error.getError(errorMsg, sizeof errorMsg);
00043         printf("%s\n", errorMsg);
00044         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00045     }
00046     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00047 }
